name: Helmeppo
text: On Play: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card and play up to 1 [SWORD] type Character with a cost of 8 or less from your trash other then [Helmeppo]. Then, at the end of this turn, place 1 Character played out by this effect to the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card and play up to 1 [SWORD] type Character with a cost of 8 or less from your trash other then [Helmeppo]. Then, at the end of this turn, place 1 Character played out by this effect to the bottom of its owner's deck.
